casebody.data:
INTERNATIONAL PROPERTY DEVELOPMENTS, LLC d/b/a Signature Group
v.
K CONSTRUCTION & ROOFING, LLC, Evangel Worship Center, Inc., and Bank of the Ozarks as successor-in-interest to Bank of the Carolinas No. 72P19 Supreme Court of North Carolina. May 9, 2019 Fred W. DeVore, III, Attorney at Law, Charlotte, for Evangel Worship Center, Inc. Brian J. Schoolman, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, for International Property Developments, LLC. Bryan G. Scott, Attorney at Law, Winston-Salem, for Bank of the Ozarks.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 1st of March 2019 by Defendant (Evangel Worship Center, Inc.) in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G. S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 9th of May 2019."
